name: Xavier Watkins
tagline: Web things, music and data viz
body:
### Projects
#### Artist Lowdown http://xavwatk.in/artist-lowdown
A collection of visualisations built on top of the Spotify, Songkick and EchoNest APIs for a given artist.

#### Genome synth http://xavwatk.in/genome-synth
Listen to the sounds of the genome
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
